   I've been doing some research on piracy in general, and found some 
very interesting information on the wako, and on the Murakami in 
specific.  The only problem is that any information seems to stop after 
Kuki Yoshitaka's victory in the second battle of Kizugawaguchi and 
Hideyoshi's release of his anti-piracy edict.  I need to know what 
happened to the Murakami in the time between their defeat, and 
Tokugawa's rise to power.  Did they cease to exist as a naval power 
altogether?  Also, any information on naval battles in the Seto area 
during that time, especially those involving the Murakami, Kuki, or 
Mori, would be useful. 
   I'm afraid I've exhausted all of my resources on this, any help 
would be tremendously appreciated.
